I am a Post Doctoral researcher (2019-Present) in the Laboratory of Microbiology at the Wageningen University & Research. My research is focused on investigating the ecological and physiological aspects of the human intestinal tract microbiome using synthetic microbiomes. From 2014 until 2019, I did my PhD research with Willem M. De Vos and Hauke Smidt (Laboratory of Microbiology at the Wageningen University & Research) and Leo lahti (Open Research Labs, University of Turku).
